resources.string: Need a hand to tend your garden ? Or to get rid of unwanted visitors ? Hire one a Dog Hero ! He will diligently conduct any job you give him. Don\'t get buried in snow this winter and please don\'t hurt your back shoveling. We have a Dog Hero all ready to come to your rescue for snow removal. Do you have an elderly or ill family member who needs some extra help in their home? We have a long list of experienced Dog Heroes who can help take care of that loved one for a few hours or around the clock - whatever is needed. Call Dog Hero For Hire for anything you need.
